name: welcome
subject: Welcome to Way2PG!
template:
Way2PG

Dear {{name.first}},

Congratulations! You have successfully created your account with Way2PG.

You are one step closer to finding a place you love. Explore best PGs in your preferred location and book your spot with a single click.


Start Now here


Thanks,

Team Way2PG
Try view on your Browser or Unsubscribe.

name: resendVerifySignup
subject: Confirm Signup
template:
Way2PG

Dear {{data.firstName}},

You may still use the site if your email is unverified but we can\'t send you emails.

Thanks,

Team Way2PG
